column2: "Na sɔfopanyin biara a woyi no wɔ nyimpa mu
column3: wɔhyɛ no ma nyimpa wɔ dza ɔfa Nyankopɔn ho no ho
column4: ma ɔaama ayɛyɛdze nye afɔrbɔdze wɔ bɔn ntsi
column6: "dɛ nyia otum hu ma hɔn a wonnyim dze na wɔfom
column7: osiandɛ nankasa so mberɛwyɛ mmpar no;"

column2: "na iyi ntsi otwar dɛ ɔbɔ bɔ ho afɔr ma noho dɛ mbrɛ ɔbɔ ma ɔman no."
"Na obiara mmfa dɛm enyidzi yi mma noho gyedɛ nyia Nyankopɔn afrɛ no dɛ Aaron so."
"Dɛmara so na Kraest annhyehyɛ noho dɛ ɔbɛyɛ sɔfopanyin; na mbom nyia ɔkaa kyerɛɛ no dɛ
"dɛ mbrɛ ɔka no beebi so dɛ
column3: Ɔwo eyɛ daa sɔfo Wɔ Melkizedek kwan do."

column2: "Ɔno na ber a ɔtse no honam mu no ɔdze nkekamu a ɔyɛ dzen nye nyinsu yɛɛ asɔr nye nkotoserɛ maa nyia obotum dɛ oyi no fi owu mu
column3: na ne nyamesuro ntsi wotsiee no;"
ɔbɛyɛɛ onnyiewiei nkwagye farbaa ma hɔn a wɔyɛ setsie ma no nyina."

column2: "Nyankopɔn bɔ ne dzin frɛ no Melkizedek kwan do sɔfopanyin."
"Ɔno ho na yɛwɔ nsɛm pii ka a ne nkyerɛasee yɛ dzen so
"Na mber aba a ɔsɛ dɛ hom yɛ akyerɛkyerɛfo yi
column3: ekehia hom bio dɛ obi kyerɛkyerɛ hom Nyankopɔn ho nsɛm fitsi ahyɛse
column4: na hom ayɛ dɛ hɔn a ohia hɔn numfonsu no

column2: "Na obiara a onum numfonsu no nna onnyaa tsenenee nsɛm no ho nhumu
"Na edziban a ɔyɛ dzen fata hɔn a woenyin a ntɔyɛɛ ntsi hɔn nkatsedze akokwa yie ma wotum hu papa nye bɔn."
